channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The European Union’s Economic Double Standard with America Must End
item.description: The EU can’t have it both ways: relying on American technological leadership while building an entire policy framework around curbing it.

item.title: Pixar’s ‘Elio’ Flop Is Another Sign The Studio Must Adapt To Survive
item.description: Pixar’s reliance on sequels, prequels, old animation, and repeated storylines is self-destructing the once beloved film production company.

item.title: Trump’s NATO Win
item.description: If the Europeans can deliver on their new defense-spending commitments, the result will be a much safer world.

item.title: Trump says U.S. has signed a deal with China on trade, without giving details
item.description: The U.S. and China have signed an agreement on trade, President Trump said, adding he expects to soon have a deal with India.

item.title: My Annual Allergist Visit Proved Health Care Fraud Is Easy To Commit And Hard To Report
item.description: It's so easy for scammers to manipulate our health care system in ways that raise costs for all of us.

item.title: China, U.S. signal steps to implement trade deal
item.description: The U.S. and China are taking steps to implement a London trade framework that compels the Chinese side to release rare earth minerals while the Ameri...

item.title: The Week: America Smashes Iran’s Nuclear Sites — and Negotiates a Cease-Fire
item.description: Plus: Zohran Mamdani takes out Andrew Cuomo in the first round of New York City’s Democratic mayoral primary.

item.title: Supreme Court Nukes Nationwide Injunctions Against Trump’s Birthright Citizenship Order
item.description: 'When a court concludes that the Executive Branch has acted unlawfully, the answer is not for the court to exceed its power, too.'

item.title: Mountainhead Delivers Only Scapegoats
item.description: The film posits that literally all the world’s problems are the fault of billionaire tech bros.

item.title: No, The Federal Reserve Shouldn’t Monetize The National Debt Again
item.description: Lawmakers of all parties keep thinking that some magic bullet will solve all of the country’s fiscal problems. It won’t.

item.title: Ranked Choice at the Movies
item.description: Hollywood’s version of the anti-majority election scheme.

item.title: The Same Democrats Trying To Discredit Emil Bove Had No Worries Confirming Activist Judges
item.description: The truth is Bove is experienced, competent, and without glaring issues that should prevent him from being confirmed.

item.title: Trump seizes momentum from ceasefire deal to expand peace in Middle East
item.description: Three days after announcing a ceasefire between Iran and Israel, the Trump administration is working to broaden a sustainable peace in the region, inc...

item.title: 'He needs to be deported': Tennessee congressman calls for DOJ probe into Mamdani's naturalization
item.description: Rep. Andy Ogles, Tennessee Republican, urged the Justice Department to open an investigation into New York City mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, sayi...

item.title: Trump gathers cross-section of Americans at the White House to extoll the benefits of his big bill
item.description: President Trump on Thursday called on Congress to pass his One Big Beautiful Bill Act, saying it would stave off the "largest tax hike in history" and...
